synopsis.text:
Because of his extraordinary abilities and remarkable self-healing power, Zhao Xiaotian finds himself in a world where martial arts reign supreme after an unexpected explosion. As the newly-minted grandson of the affluent Zhao family, he becomes a target for malicious individuals, leading his family to send him to the prestigious Free School for martial arts training. Shockingly, Zhao Xiaotian, who has never practiced martial arts before, demonstrates unparalleled talent.

Despite his master's fears of pride, Zhao Xiaotian is taught through suppression, causing him to believe he is weaker than he truly is and pushing him to train even harder. Unbeknownst to him, he forms deep bonds with his fellow students as he grows stronger. However, with great power comes hidden dangers, and Zhao Xiaotian must soon face the challenge of undergoing a trial.

In this new world, Zhao Xiaotian encounters various hardships related to his supernatural powers, but he remains steadfast in his pursuit of martial arts mastery. Despite being targeted by villains and suffering through kidnappings and financial losses, he perseveres on his cultivation journey, forming unbreakable friendships along the way. But as his strength increases, so does the looming crisis, and Zhao Xiaotian must prepare for the trials that await him.
